name: Ros Delivery Service
description:
Controls
  • Move: arrow keys
  • Jump: Z
  • Attack: X
  • Dash: C
  • Restart: R
Description

Roots are the part of the plant that's responsible for escorting water and nutrients from the soil to the plant. But how exactly does the root work? Well the answer to that is little Ros, who works hard to deliver the nutrients to the plant. In this 2D platformer, you play as Ross as you try to navigate the treacherous environment of the roots and fulfill your duty of escorting nutrients to the plant. Battle critters, avoid obstacles, and make sure those nutrients are delivered safe and sound!

This game was originally made in4 8 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots".

Credits

Programming: Ahmad Al Shafii
